mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT ams.AttSeq, ams.SchName, ams.SchSeq, ams.WorkZone, ams.AttDayStartTime, ams.AttDayEndTime, ams.AssYn, ams.Memo, ams.BaseYn, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM attendance_mng_schedule_member amm WHERE amm.SchSeq = ams.SchSeq) MemberCnt, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(ur.DisplayName SEPARATOR ',') FROM attendance_mng_schedule_member mem, sys_object_user ur WHERE mem.SchSeq = ams.SchSeq AND mem.UserCode = ur.UserCode) MemberList, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM attendance_mng_schedule_alloc ama WHERE ama.SchSeq = ams.SchSeq) AllocCnt ,CONCAT(ams.WorkZone,',', wpinfo.wplist ) as WorkPlace FROM covi_smart4j.attendance_mng_schedule ams LEFT JOIN (SELECT swp.SchSeq, GROUP_CONCAT(wp.WorkZone SEPARATOR ',') as wplist FROM attendance_mng_schedule_workplace swp, attendance_workplace wp WHERE swp.LocationSeq = wp.LocationSeq GROUP BY swp.SchSeq ) wpinfo ON wpinfo.SchSeq = ams.SchSeq WHERE ams.CompanyCode = #{CompanyCode} AND ams.ValidYn = 'Y'
AND ams.SchSeq = #{SchSeq}
) tbl
WHERE
SchName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{schTxt}, '%') OR WorkPlace LIKE CONCAT('%', #{schTxt}, '%') OR MemberList LIKE CONCAT('%', #{schTxt}, '%') OR Memo LIKE CONCAT('%', #{schTxt}, '%')
SchName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{schTxt}, '%')
WorkPlace LIKE CONCAT('%', #{schTxt}, '%')
MemberList LIKE CONCAT('%', #{schTxt}, '%')
Memo LIKE CONCAT('%', #{schTxt}, '%')

/* attend.schedule.getAttendScheduleDetail */ SELECT ams.AttSeq ,ams.SchName ,ams.SchSeq ,ams.AttDayStartTime ,ams.AttDayEndTime ,ams.AssYn ,ams.AssSeq ,ams.SelfCommYn ,ams.AttDayAC ,ams.AttDayIdle ,ams.Memo ,ams.NextDayYn ,StartSunHour, StartSunMin, EndSunHour, EndSunMin, NextDayYnSun ,StartMonHour, StartMonMin, EndMonHour, EndMonMin, NextDayYnMon ,StartTueHour, StartTueMin, EndTueHour, EndTueMin, NextDayYnTue ,StartWedHour, StartWedMin, EndWedHour, EndWedMin, NextDayYnWed ,StartThuHour, StartThuMin, EndThuHour, EndThuMin, NextDayYnThu ,StartFriHour, StartFriMin, EndFriHour, EndFriMin, NextDayYnFri ,StartSatHour, StartSatMin, EndSatHour, EndSatMin, NextDayYnSat ,AcSun, AcMon, AcTue, AcWed, AcThu, AcFri, AcSat ,IdleSun, IdleMon, IdleTue, IdleWed, IdleThu, IdleFri, IdleSat ,WorkZone, WorkAddr, WorkPointX, WorkPointY, AllowRadius ,AutoExtenYn, AutoExtenMinTime, AutoExtenMaxTime ,WorkingSystemType ,CoreTimeYn, ifnull(CoreStartTimeHour, '00') CoreStartTimeHour, ifnull(CoreStartTimeMin, '00') CoreStartTimeMin, ifnull(CoreEndTimeHour, '00') CoreEndTimeHour, ifnull(CoreEndTimeMin, '00') CoreEndTimeMin ,GoWorkTimeYn, ifnull(GoWorkStartTimeHour, '00') GoWorkStartTimeHour, ifnull(GoWorkStartTimeMin, '00') GoWorkStartTimeMin, ifnull(GoWorkEndTimeHour, '00') GoWorkEndTimeHour, ifnull(GoWorkEndTimeMin, '00') GoWorkEndTimeMin ,OffWorkTimeYn, ifnull(OffWorkStartTimeHour, '00') OffWorkStartTimeHour, ifnull(OffWorkStartTimeMin, '00') OffWorkStartTimeMin, ifnull(OffWorkEndTimeHour, '00') OffWorkEndTimeHour, ifnull(OffWorkEndTimeMin, '00') OffWorkEndTimeMin FROM covi_smart4j.attendance_mng_schedule ams WHERE ams.CompanyCode = #{CompanyCode} AND ams.SchSeq = #{SchSeq} AND ams.ValidYn = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE covi_smart4j.attendance_mng_schedule SET BaseYn = CASE WHEN SchSeq = #{SchSeq} then 'Y' else 'N' end WHERE CompanyCode = #{CompanyCode} AND ValidYn = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(AllocSeq) FROM ( SELECT AllocSeq, AllocType, AllocID FROM covi_smart4j.attendance_mng_schedule_alloc amsm INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user AS u ON u.UserCode = amsm.AllocID WHERE amsm.SchSeq = #{SchSeq} AND amsm.AllocType = 'UR' UNION SELECT AllocSeq, AllocType, AllocID FROM covi_smart4j.attendance_mng_schedule_alloc amsm INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_group AS g ON g.GroupCode = amsm.AllocID WHERE amsm.SchSeq = #{SchSeq} AND amsm.AllocType != 'UR') a

SELECT AllocSeq, AllocType, AllocID, DisplayName AllocName FROM covi_smart4j.attendance_mng_schedule_alloc amsm INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user AS u ON u.UserCode = amsm.AllocID WHERE amsm.SchSeq = #{SchSeq} AND amsm.AllocType = 'UR' UNION SELECT AllocSeq, AllocType, AllocID, DisplayName FROM covi_smart4j.attendance_mng_schedule_alloc amsm INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_group AS g ON g.GroupCode = amsm.AllocID WHERE amsm.SchSeq = #{SchSeq} AND amsm.AllocType != 'UR' ORDER BY AllocType ,AllocID
LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{pageOffset}

SELECT b.LocationSeq as LocationSeq , b.WorkZone as WorkZone , b.WorkZoneGroupNm as WorkZoneGroupNm , b.WorkAddr AS WorkAddr , b.AllowRadius AS AllowRadius , b.WorkPointX AS WorkPointX , b.WorkPointY AS WorkPointY FROM covi_smart4j.attendance_mng_schedule_workplace a INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.attendance_workplace b on a.LocationSeq = b.LocationSeq WHERE a.SchSeq = #{SchSeq} and a.WorkPlaceType = #{WorkPlaceType}

SELECT SchSeq , SchName , AttDayStartTime AS StartTime , AttDayEndTime AS EndTime , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(REPLACE(#{SetDate}, '-',''), AttDayStartTime, '00'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS AttDayStartTime , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(REPLACE(#{SetDate}, '-',''), AttDayEndTime, '00'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS AttDayEndTime FROM attendance_mng_schedule WHERE CompanyCode = #{CompanyCode} AND ValidYn = 'Y' AND BaseYn = 'Y'
